mapper.select: SELECT a.attachment_id attachmentId, a.attachment_type attachmentType, a.attachment_name attachmentName, di.doc_type fileType, ff.file_size fileSize FROM component_apply_attachment a left join doc_info di on di.doc_id = a.attachment_id LEFT JOIN fs_file ff ON di.file_id = ff.file_id WHERE 1=1 and a.component_id =#{componentId} order by a.attachment_type
